item.title: 杰富瑞因对冲基金 352 Capital 遭诉讼而清盘
item.description: 据知情人士透露，杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. is winding down trading positions at its hedge fund 352 Capital, after the fund sued its former portfolio manager over an alleged fraud, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Dollar General 同意就工作场所安全指控与美国达成和解
item.description: 美元通用公司（Dollar General Corp.）同意与美国安全监管机构达成一项全公司范围内的全面和解协议，这对于美国最普遍的零售商来说是一个潜在的转折点，因为多年来该公司商店的安全状况一直备受争议。【原文：Dollar General Corp. agreed to a sweeping companywide settlement with US safety regulators, a potential turning point for the nation’s most ubiquitous retailer after years of controversy about safety conditions in its stores.】

item.title: 大科技公司遭遇一年来最严重跌幅，利率押注刺激轮动
item.description: 周四，S&P 500 指数自 11 月份以来最长的连涨势头被推动该指数长达一年涨势的大盘股科技股所阻挡。【原文：The S&P 500’s longest winning streak since November was stopped Thursday by the same cohort that’s powered the index’s yearlong rally — megacap tech.】

item.title: 大空头 "投资者史蒂夫-艾斯曼说，你必须拥有大型科技公司
item.description: Neuberger Berman Group 的史蒂夫-艾斯曼（Steve Eisman）预计，随着消费者通过电子设备越来越容易获得人工智能，美国大型科技股的超强走势将 "持续数年"。【原文：Neuberger Berman Group’s Steve Eisman expects the outsized strength in US megacap technology shares will “last for years,” as artificial intelligence becomes more accessible to consumers via electronic devices.】

item.title: S&P 公司称法兰克福办公大楼价值缩水近 40
item.description: 据 S&P 全球评级公司在一份报告中估计，法兰克福机场旁的办公和酒店综合体 The Squaire 的价值自上次官方估值以来可能暴跌了近 40%。【原文：The value of The Squaire, an office and hotel complex next to Frankfurt airport, may have plunged almost 40% since the last official valuation, S&P Global Ratings estimated in a report.】

item.title: 简街在贸易机密之争中击溃千年防线
item.description: 简街集团在对千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）和两名前交易员提起的商业秘密诉讼案中赢得了一轮胜诉，千禧管理公司和两名前交易员试图辩称，简街集团遭受的损失是其自身 "极不寻常的交易活动 "造成的，而不是所谓的策略盗窃。【原文：Jane Street Group won a round in its trade secrets suit against Millennium Management and two ex-traders, who tried to argue that losses suffered by Jane Street were due to its own “highly unusual trading activity” rather than alleged strategy theft.】

item.title: 邦吉公司以 80 亿美元收购 Viterra 的交易面临延期风险
item.description: 邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）斥资 80 亿美元收购嘉能可（Glencore Plc）支持的 Viterra 公司的交易正面临被推迟的风险，因为包括加拿大、中国和欧盟在内的国家尚未批准这项收购。【原文：Bunge Global SA’s $8 billion deal to acquire Glencore Plc-backed Viterra is facing the risk of delays as countries including Canada, China and the European Union are yet to approve the acquisition.】

item.title: 特鲁多称加拿大将在 2032 年前实现北约支出目标
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）表示，到 2032 年，加拿大将达到北约关于国防开支占国内生产总值 2% 的要求。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau says Canada will hit NATO’s requirement to spend 2% of gross domestic product on defense by 2032.】

item.title: 乌克兰称扣押运输 "掠夺 "谷物的船只
item.description: 乌克兰扣押了一艘货船，声称该船从俄罗斯占领区运输 "掠夺的农产品"，这是自 2022 年莫斯科入侵以来乌克兰采取的首次此类行动。【原文：Ukraine has seized a cargo vessel that it claims has ferried “looted agricultural products” procured from its Russian-occupied territories, the first such action since Moscow’s invasion in 2022.】

item.title: 专家称北欧联合银行面临洗钱罚款近 10 亿美元的风险
item.description: 据一些法律专家称，如果北欧联合银行在与丹麦的官司中败诉，它可能因涉嫌未能阻止洗钱而面临最高近 10 亿美元的罚款，这一数额将远远超出该银行自己的预期。【原文：Nordea Bank could face an estimated maximum fine of almost $1 billion over alleged failures to stop money laundering if it loses its case with Denmark, according to some legal experts, an amount that would far exceed the lender’s own expectations.】

item.title: 在炎热干燥的天气中，野火包围了加拿大的油砂城市
item.description: 加拿大的非官方油砂之都麦克默里堡（Fort McMurray）周围爆发了一圈野火，给世界第三大石油储量的原油生产增添了新的威胁。【原文：A ring of wildfires has erupted around Canada’s unofficial oil-sands capital of Fort McMurray, adding new threats to crude production from the world’s third-largest petroleum reserves.】

item.title: 法国将现行失业规则延长至 9 月底法新社
item.description: 据法新社周四报道，法国政府正计划将该国现行的失业救济规定延长至 9 月 30 日。【原文：The French government is planning to extend the country’s current unemployment benefit rules until September 30, Agence France-Presse reported Thursday.】

item.title: 即使账单减少，英国人仍深陷能源债务泥潭
item.description: 即使在账单宽松的情况下，英国家庭仍积累了 33 亿英镑（43 亿美元）的能源债务，这提醒新工党政府，电力和天然气成本的降低并没有减轻许多人的生活成本。【原文：UK households have accumulated energy debts of £3.3 billion ($4.3 billion) even as bills ease, a reminder to the new Labour government that lower power and gas costs haven’t tempered the cost of living for many.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚最高法院裁定力拓锂项目禁令无效
item.description: 塞尔维亚宪法法院推翻了一项政府法令，该法令于 2022 年在政治争议和环保活动人士的抗议声中突然阻止了力拓集团在该国耗资 24 亿美元的锂项目。【原文：Serbia’s constitutional court has overturned a government decree that in 2022 abruptly blocked Rio Tinto Plc’s $2.4 billion lithium project in the country amid political controversy and protests by environmental activists.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，媒体集团 Vivendi SE 旗下的 Canal+ 正在探讨在伦敦证券交易所上市的可能性。【原文：Media conglomerate Vivendi SE’s Canal+ is exploring a potential listing on the London Stock Exchange, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国集团同意自 2027 年起向埃及购买氢气
item.description: 德国政府支持的一个基金会已同意在未来几年从埃及进口绿色氨，以加快欧洲的能源转型。【原文：A German government-backed foundation has agreed to import green ammonia from Egypt in the coming years in a bid to accelerate Europe’s energy transition.】

item.title: 沙特王子耗资数万亿美元的改造项目面临资金削减
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯可能会在一些最大的发展项目上削减数十亿美元的开支，并搁置其他计划，因为沙特王国正在努力应对其庞大的经济改造规模。【原文：Saudi Arabia is likely to cut billions of dollars in spending on some of its biggest development projects, and place other plans on hold, as the kingdom grapples with the scale of its vast economic makeover.】

item.title: 斯卡拉穆奇的 SkyBridge 在加密货币飙升时仍限制客户退出
item.description: 安东尼-斯卡拉穆奇（Anthony Scaramucci）实际上禁止客户退出 SkyBridge Capital 以加密货币为重点的对冲基金，尽管该基金的回报率已经跃升。【原文：Anthony Scaramucci effectively barred clients from exiting SkyBridge Capital’s crypto-focused hedge fund, even though returns have jumped.】

item.title: 华尔街银行财报后将掀起债券销售狂潮
item.description: 华尔街最大的银行在公布第二季度盈利报告后，将比平时借贷更多的资金，因为这些金融巨头希望在今年晚些时候可能出现的波动之前，利用有吸引力的借贷成本。【原文：Wall Street’s biggest banks are set to borrow much more than they usually do after reporting second-quarter earnings as the financial giants look to capitalize on attractive borrowing costs ahead of potential volatility later this year.】

item.description: 经过七周的证词，陪审团于周三裁定 Archegos 资本管理公司首席执行官 Bill Hwang 的市场操纵罪名成立，这起联邦案件对华尔街的正常观念提出了挑战。【原文：After seven weeks of testimony, the jury in Bill Hwang’s market manipulation trial on Wednesday found the Archegos Capital Management chief guilty, in a federal case that challenged the notion of normal on Wall Street.】
